
``getDistinctColors``
=========================

getDistinctColors

Description
-----------

Returns a number of distint colors based on the RGB scale

Usage
-----

.. code-block:: r

   getDistinctColors(n)

Arguments
---------

.. list-table::
   :header-rows: 1

   * - Argument
     - Description
   * - ``n``
     - number of colors wanted


Value
-----

number of distinct colors
